AI Description: NextPolish is a versatile and efficient tool for correcting long reads generated by third-generation sequencing technologies. It uses a noise model and an expectation-maximization algorithm to polish raw reads, improving their accuracy for downstream analysis.
Core Features: Error Correction For Long Reads, Utilizes Noise Model & Expectation-Maximization Algorithm, Improves Read Accuracy For Better Downstream Analysis
General Tags: Bioinformatics, Computational Biology, Long-Read Sequencing, Error Correction
